TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogRecord extends System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord

summary.span: Contains the properties of an event instance for an event that is received from an object.

span.span: Contains the properties of an event instance for an event that is received from an object.

summary.span: The event properties provide information about the event such as the name of the computer where the event was logged and the time that the event was created.

span.span: The event properties provide information about the event such as the name of the computer where the event was logged and the time that the event was created.

summary.span: This allows consumers to group related activities.

span.span: This allows consumers to group related activities.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Id As Integer
public: virtual property int Id { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the identifier for this event.

span.span: Gets the identifier for this event.

summary.span: All events with this identifier value represent the same type of event.

span.span: All events with this identifier value represent the same type of event.
Returns an integer value.
This value can be null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Keywords As Nullable(Of Long)
public: virtual property Nullable<long> Keywords { Nullable<long> get(); };

summary.span: Gets the keyword mask of the event.

span.span: Gets the keyword mask of the event.

summary.span: Get the value of the property to get the name of the keywords used in this mask.

span.span: Get the value of the property to get the name of the keywords used in this mask.
Returns a long value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的關鍵字用來與其他事件的使用量為基礎的類似事件的事件。The keywords for an event are used to group the event with other similar events based on the usage of the events. 每個關鍵字的位元是 64 位元遮罩中。Each keyword is a bit in a 64-bit mask. 預先定義的位元值和保留的位元佔據這個遮罩，讓資訊清單使用 0x0000000000000001 和 0x0000800000000000 之間任何位元的前 16 個位置。Predefined bit values and reserved bits occupy the top 16 positions of this mask, leaving the manifest to use any bits between 0x0000000000000001 and 0x0000800000000000. 中所定義的標準事件關鍵字列舉型別。The standard event keywords are defined in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property KeywordsDisplayNames As IEnumerable(Of String)

summary.span: Gets the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

span.span: Gets the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

value.span: 傳回字串的可列舉集合，包含此事件的關鍵字遮罩中所使用之關鍵字的顯示名稱。

span.span: Returns an enumerable collection of strings that contain the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所定義的標準事件關鍵字列舉型別。The standard event keywords are defined in the enumeration.

summary.span: Gets the level of the event.

span.span: Gets the level of the event.

summary.span: The level signifies the severity of the event.

span.span: The level signifies the severity of the event.

summary.span: For the name of the level, get the value of the property.

span.span: For the name of the level, get the value of the property.
Returns a byte value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所定義的標準事件層級列舉型別。The standard event levels are defined in the enumeration.

value.span: 傳回包含這個事件的層級的顯示名稱的字串。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the display name of the level for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所定義的標準事件層級列舉型別。The standard event levels are defined in the enumeration.

summary.span: The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

span.span: The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

summary.span: For the name of the opcode, get the value of the property.

span.span: For the name of the opcode, get the value of the property.
Returns a short value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所定義的標準事件 opcode列舉型別。The standard event opcodes are defined in the enumeration.

value.span: 傳回字串，包含發行此事件的事件提供者的名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property RelatedActivityId As Nullable(Of Guid)
public: virtual property Nullable<Guid> RelatedActivityId { Nullable<Guid> get(); };

summary.span: Gets a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a related activity in a process for which an event is involved.

span.span: Gets a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a related activity in a process for which an event is involved.
Returns a GUID value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件提供者可以發佈事件之前設定 ActivityID 屬性的值。An event provider can set the value of the ActivityID attribute before publishing events. 已發行之後設定此識別碼的所有事件將 ActivityID 屬性會設定為指定的值。All the events that are published after this ID is set will have the ActivityID attribute set to the specified value. 這可讓提供者來指定簡單事件之間的關聯性。This allows providers to specify simple relationships between events. 已發行事件屬於相同的活動。The events that are published are part of the same activity. 當提供者必須啟動新的但相關的活動時，「 發行者 」 可以發行的傳輸事件，並指定新的活動識別碼。When a provider must start a new, but related activity, the publisher can publish a transfer event and specify the new activity ID. 這個新的 ID 會顯示為 RelatedActivityID 屬性。This new ID will appear as a RelatedActivityID attribute. 這可讓取用者群組相關活動。This allows consumers to group related activities.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Task As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: virtual property Nullable<int> Task { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: Gets a task identifier for a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event.

span.span: Gets a task identifier for a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event.

summary.span: A task is a 16-bit value with 16 top values reserved.

span.span: A task is a 16-bit value with 16 top values reserved.

summary.span: This type allows any value between 0x0000 and 0xffef to be used.

span.span: This type allows any value between 0x0000 and 0xffef to be used.

summary.span: For the name of the task, get the value of the property.

span.span: For the name of the task, get the value of the property.
Returns an integer value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準事件工作定義於列舉型別。The standard event tasks are defined in the enumeration.

value.span: 傳回包含事件之工作的顯示名稱的字串。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the display name of the task for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準事件工作定義於列舉型別。The standard event tasks are defined in the enumeration.
